BOT_TOKEN.description: The telegram bot token that you get from @BotFather

GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: This is the folder ID of the Google Drive Folder to which you want to upload all the mirrors.

OWNER_ID.description: The Telegram user ID (not username) of the owner of the bot

DOWNLOAD_DIR.description: The path to the local folder where the downloads should be downloaded to

DOWNLOAD_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL.description: A short interval of time in seconds after which the Mirror progress message is updated. (I recommend to keep it 5 seconds at least)

AUTO_DELETE_MESSAGE_DURATION.description: Interval of time (in seconds), after which the bot deletes it's message (and command message) which is expected to be viewed instantly. Note: Set to -1 to never automatically delete messages

IS_TEAM_DRIVE.description: (Optional field) Set to 'True' if GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID is from a Team Drive else False or Leave it empty.

USER_SESSION_STRING.description: Generate String session by clicking here https://string-session.sonywegas.repl.run/

TELEGRAM_API.description: This is to authenticate to your telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org DO NOT put this in quotes.

TELEGRAM_HASH.description: This is to authenticate to your telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org

USE_SERVICE_ACCOUNTS.description: (Optional field) (Leave empty if unsure) Whether to use service accounts or not. For this to work see 'Using service accounts' section below.

INDEX_URL.description: (Optional field) Refer to https://github.com/maple3142/GDIndex/ The URL should not have any trailing '/'

MEGA_API_KEY.description: Mega.nz api key to mirror mega.nz links. Get it from Mega SDK Page

MEGA_EMAIL_ID.description: Your email id you used to sign up on mega.nz for using premium accounts (Leave th)

MEGA_PASSWORD.description: Your password for your mega.nz account

STOP_DUPLICATE_MIRROR.description: (Optional field) (Leave empty if unsure) if this field is set to True , bot will check file in drive, if it is present in drive, downloading will ne stopped. (Note - File will be checked using filename, not using filehash, so this feature is not perfect yet)

BLOCK_MEGA_LINKS.description: (Optional field) If you want to remove mega.nz mirror support (bcoz it's too much buggy and unstable), set it to True.

SHORTENER.description: (Optional field) if you want to use shortener in Gdrive and index link, fill shotener url here.

SHORTENER_API.description: Fill your shortener api key if you are using shortener.

BUTTON_THREE_NAME.description: Add more buttons (two buttons are already added of file link and index link, you can add extra buttons too, these are optional)
